item.title: Internet Content Filtering and Site Blocking Using pfBlockerNG on pfSense
item.description: pfBlockerNG extends the capability of the pfSense firewall and beyond the traditional state full firewall. pfBlockerNG provides the ability to pfSense firewall to make allow/deny decisions based upon items such as Geo-location, IP address, Alexa rating and the domain name.
